name: Pajama Sam Vol. 1
description:
Sam is a little scared of the dark until he turns into the world's youngest superhero Pajama Sam. Now he sets out to confront his fear of darkness and thunderstorm. Join the midnight quest to shed some light on Sam’s mysterious closet, and travel to World Wide Weather, the storm-stirring factory in the sky!

Pajama Sam Vol. 1 includes:
- Pajama Sam: No Need to Hide When It’s Dark Outside
- Pajama Sam 2: Thunder and Lightning Aren’t so Frightening
- Pajama Sam’s Lost & FoundChallenging games for children of all ages Colorful and expressive characters Hundreds of click-point surprises New puzzles and challenges each time you play
